sentences.english: Are vegans really at greater risk of B12 deficiency?
sentences.chinese: 纯素食者患维生素B12缺乏症的风险真的很高吗？

sentences.english: It concluded Se, Zn-aminoacid remedy given a great effects on children zinc deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 可见硒锌氨基酸治疗儿童锌缺乏症取得显著疗效。

sentences.english: This is an X-linked deficiency of one of the enzymes in the urea cycle.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个X染色体缺陷导致的尿素循环酶缺乏症之一。

sentences.english: Gene mutation analysis was performed for patients with BH4 deficiency and their parents.
sentences.chinese: 对BH4缺乏症者及父母进行基因突变检测。

sentences.english: Cockatiels are prone to vitamin-A deficiencies and fatty liver disease.
sentences.chinese: 鸡尾很容易患上维他命A缺乏症与脂肪肝。

sentences.english: An abnormally low number of leukocytes in the circulating blood.
sentences.chinese: 白血球缺乏症这样一种血液紊乱相关的。

sentences.english: Have you ever known anyone with a protein deficiency?
sentences.chinese: 你听说过谁患了蛋白质缺乏症吗？

sentences.english: Iodine deficiency can easily be prevented at low cost.
sentences.chinese: 碘缺乏症可很容易以低成本预防。

sentences.english: Should You Buy A GHD Flat Iron?
sentences.chinese: 如果你购买了生长激素缺乏症扁铁？

sentences.english: Conclusions A high G6PD frequency is found in Dong ethnic group in Guizhou Congjiang.
sentences.chinese: 结论贵州省从江侗族是G6PD缺乏症的高发区。

sentences.english: Many children in the poor area had calcium deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 许多贫困地区的儿童得了钙缺乏症。
